text: (soft music)
♪ Let's make our own construction site ♪
♪ We've got the tools to do it right ♪
♪ We'll push and mix and smash and scoop ♪
♪ Like real construction people do ♪
♪ The big steam roller pounds the ground ♪
♪ Pounds it flat while rolling round ♪
♪ Rolling, rolling, it's so much fun ♪
♪ To get construction done ♪
♪ The concrete mixer blends and spins ♪
♪ All we need to make cement ♪
♪ Blending, spinning, it's so much fun ♪
♪ To get construction done ♪
♪ The rumbly dump truck drops and loads ♪
♪ What we need down the road ♪
♪ Dropping, loading, it's so much fun ♪
♪ To get construction done ♪
♪ The great, tall crane lowers and lifts ♪
♪ Heavy things smooth and swift ♪
♪ Lowering, lifting, it's so much ♪
♪ To get construction done ♪
♪ Let's make our own construction site ♪
♪ We've got the tools to do it right ♪
♪ We'll push and mix and smash and scoop ♪
♪ Like real construction people do ♪
♪ The excavator scoops and drops ♪
♪ Lots of dirt, cement, and rocks ♪
♪ Scooping, dropping, it's so much ♪
♪ To get construction done ♪
♪ The big, old dozer pushes round ♪
♪ Dirt and rubble on the ground ♪
♪ Pushing, pushing, it's so much fun ♪
♪ To get construction done ♪
♪ Let's make our own construction site ♪
♪ We've got the tools to do it right ♪
♪ We'll push and mix and smash and scoop ♪
♪ Like real construction peoples do ♪
(soft music)
